faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Common questions about booking, payments, and hosting.
faq.q1: How do I book a pool or camp?
faq.a1: Open the listing, select your date and time, and send a booking request. You’ll get a confirmation by SMS or email.
faq.a2: Hosts set their own prices. Some listings add cleaning or service fees, shown before you submit.
faq.a3: Each listing has its own policy. Check the policy on the listing page before booking.
faq.q4: Do I need an account to book?
faq.a4: Yes. Creating an account lets you track requests, messages, and receipts.
faq.q5: I want to list my pool or camp.
faq.a5: Go to “Become a host”, add photos, rules, and pricing, then publish. We review new listings quickly.
faq.a6: We support common local methods and cards. Some hosts accept cash on confirmation.
faq.a7: Yes. Contact us via WhatsApp or the contact form for urgent issues.
